scripts.deploy-legacy:demo: yarn manifest demo && graph deploy --product hosted-service lemonadesocial/lemonade-marketplace-demo
scripts.deploy-legacy:demo-backup: yarn manifest demo && graph deploy --product hosted-service lemonadesocial/lemonade-marketplace-demo-backup subgraph.backup.yaml
scripts.deploy-legacy:mainnet: yarn manifest mainnet && graph deploy --product hosted-service lemonadesocial/lemonade-marketplace-mainnet
scripts.deploy-legacy:mainnet-backup: yarn manifest mainnet && graph deploy --product hosted-service lemonadesocial/lemonade-marketplace-mainnet-backup subgraph.backup.yaml
scripts.deploy-legacy:testnet: yarn manifest testnet && graph deploy --product hosted-service lemonadesocial/lemonade-marketplace-testnet
scripts.deploy-legacy:testnet-backup: yarn manifest testnet && graph deploy --product hosted-service lemonadesocial/lemonade-marketplace-testnet-backup subgraph.backup.yaml
